abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-user-mobil: Kodai ko a'a wani ma'aikaci yana gyara ta amfani da sigar wayar hannu

mobile-frontend-cite-none-available: Anan ba nassoshi da aka tanadar ga wannan shafin.

mobile-frontend-contributions-404-title: Sunan ma'aikaci mara kyau aka bayar

ID na sauyin da kuka bukata babu shi.
